body:
Hello i make custom intros for youtube channels whether it be minecraft or not 
If you would like to see some of my work just message me and ill get back to you and hopefully
You will have a intro

Sincerely PigNutWildCat

replies.body:
Hey.

Using other peoples work and calling it your own is called plagiarism.

It would of been okay if you gave the owner credit. But you said
"Hello i make custom intros for youtube channels"

This is not tolerated. Do not do it again. First and only warning.
replies.body_tagged:
Hey.

Using other peoples work and calling it your own is called plagiarism.

It would of been okay if you gave the owner credit. But you said

This is not tolerated. Do not do it again. First and only warning.
